description:
The Icehouse release features settings in nova.conf that enable you to configure automatic purging of unused images from the image cache.

Related to 	Change-Id: Iec47c28a38761c187226c5eff3ab69da503437f6
title: Add image cache purging settings to nova.conf doc

comments.content:
The Icehouse release features settings in nova.conf that enable you to configure automatic purging of unused images from the image cache.
